item.title: January 29, 2025 at 2:27:19 PM
item.description:
January 10, 2025 I quoted Matt Stein.

Abandoning Alfred for Raycast was hard, and it even took me two tries because it felt unthinkable, but Raycast is really good and wonderfully connected to other things I use.

At the time I wrote, “I think I need to try again,” so I did. I reinstalled Raycast for the umpteenth time. Yesterday, I returned to Alfred. Raycast is undoubtedly a great app. If I were starting fresh with a launcher, it would be my top choice. However, having used Alfred for so long, I find it difficult to abandon it.
